title.rendered: Have you tried the best App for Driver on Call yet?

content.rendered:
Here’s the best App for Drivers on Call.

Have you tried it yet?

Not for an hourly service, but when you need a permanent Driver for yourself, you must try Helpers Near Me.

Connecting with good Car Drivers near you is simple & easy now.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

For most of us living in metro cities, having a Private Driver available on call sometimes seems necessary.

Some days, even if you have to travel only for a few kilometres, the roads are always so jam-packed that even half an hour’s drive takes an hour and a half.

Managing a bumper-to-bumper drive takes away all your energy in the morning and keeps you away from some of the essential things you might have done without a driver.

It is quite a task to own a car and drive through the day alone.

  • Where do you park your car when attending multiple meetings at different locations? A parking ticket is less of an issue. The concern always is finding a space.
  • Driving through the busy roads, more so at peak times, especially when crossing the city’s central hub.
  • Managing bumper-to-bumper drive every day, morning & evening, both.
  • Safety concerns of valuables like office laptops, mobile phones or shades when you park your car at some corner, where you had to, just because you were running short of time for the meeting
  • Minimum 1-2 hrs of drive time, even if it is a short distance.

These are just some of the multiple challenges that many face almost daily.

How much do Drivers cost? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring Drivers?

The monthly cost of hiring a Driver varies between ₹17,000 and ₹18,000, depending on the car to drive.

In some cases, the cost of a Driver goes as high as ₹22,000 to ₹25,000, especially if he’s driving an automatic luxury car or if he’s driving the car for an Expat.

(SOURCE – SalaryTracker)

Do you want to check the monthly cost of Drivers near you? Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

Having a permanent Private Driver on call just solves most of the issues:

  • No waiting time – Leave the car anywhere & hop on it somewhere, all because now you have a Driver on call
  • Finding a parking space is no more a concern
  • Driving through the busy roads all through the day seems easy.
  • And the best part is that you get to either work, take essential calls or relax during those 1-2 hours of drive time.

Suddenly all the challenges go away.

Because now you have your Private Driver, and he’s always available on call.

However, there’s still one big challenge.

When you’ve decided you need a Driver, the next big block is:

How do you find a Private Driver? – One who works for you permanently. And who is ethical & honest on whom you could rely almost daily.

There aren’t many options available for you when you need a permanent Private Driver.

Your first thought is to ask your friend, neighbour, nearest security guard or people working at your place.

Sure, you can find a Driver by this approach. However, it would take at least a week or a few weeks by the time you find one.

Your second approach is finding a Driver online. You may find a few options here as well.

But the usual options you may come across are those where you get a Driver for the day and pay them hourly.

However, this option doesn’t work out all the time.

Because if you own a car, your need for a Driver is more often not hourly, but for the one who can work for you permanently.

So, what do you do? How do you find a trustworthy Private Driver to work with you permanently?

Meet Helpers Near Me.

It solves the problem of finding a Driver in the easiest possible way.

Helpers Near Me lets you find a Driver in just 5 minutes.

Even the charges are nominal – starting at Rs.99/- only.

Furthermore, it helps you find multiple Drivers on call, not only one.

Having this choice ensures that you get a well-experienced Driver who understands the city well, and fits your budget.

Here are 11 compelling reasons why you should try Helpers Near Me when you are searching for a Driver on call:

1) Convenient, Easy & Organized

Helpers Near Me is an Easier, Simpler & Better way of finding Drivers.

5 minutes and just a click of a few buttons are all it takes to find Private or Commercial Drivers at Helpers Near Me.

Finding and hiring a Driver was never as easy and as organised earlier.

2) Professionally Verified Drivers only

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Driver registered with the platform.

Everyone individual’s ID & Court/Criminal Records are checked in detail at the neighbouring District Courts around their addresses.

Learn more about the 2/3 Step Verification Process at Helpers Near Me.

Furthermore, you can also get your current Driver verified by this process. It does not matter if he was hired from Helpers Near Me or elsewhere.

The primary objective is to help you get proper due diligence done for your Driver before or after you’ve hired him.

3) Connect with nearby Drivers

At Helpers Near Me, you get an easy answer to “drivers near me”, preferably within 1-3 km of your search location.

4) Speak to multiple Drivers on call before hiring

If available, Helpers Near Me connects you with multiple Drivers from nearby, not just one or two.

Who doesn’t prefer choices, more so when you immediately need to hire a Driver?

Moreover, when you want to hire a Driver permanently, you would always want to meet with a few before deciding who to hire.

To give you enough choices, Helpers Near Me tries connecting you with as many options as possible from your nearby locations.

5) Find & Hire a Driver at a nominal fee only

At Helpers Near Me, you connect with multiple Drivers at a nominal fee starting at Rs.99/- only.

There are no additional charges.

Except only when you want access to the person’s background verification report.

But the report is also available to you at a nominal fee of just Rs.199/-

So, technically, the entire transaction happens at a nominal fee only.

6) Get the best-shortlisted Drivers from a vast pool of Workers

A unique rating system allows Helpers Near Me to connect you with the best Drivers from around your search location.

This unique rating system at Helpers Near Me is one of a kind.

The Rating System is designed on a sophisticated algorithm, which ensures you always get the best option.

7) Empowers the Workers to connect with you directly

Helpers Near Me supports the workers in finding nearby work opportunities.

The platform does so by connecting the Drivers directly with you.

By connecting directly with you, he can decide and opt for the work out of his own will.

No one influences his decision.

Furthermore, the Worker gets to decide her salary as well.

In turn, this process helps him take control of his life and her source of income.

The Workers join Helpers Near Me free of cost and their free will.

8) No middlemen & commissions in between

At Helpers Near Me, since you connect with the Drivers directly, there are no middlemen & commissions in between.

It is a straightforward digital platform that brings you and the workers together, Driver in your case, so you connect and care for each other’s requirements.

9) The Driver gets to earn his full salary

Every worker hired through Helpers Near Me gets an opportunity in life to earn a full salary.

They get all they earn without paying commissions to someone else in between.

10) Safe & Secure Payment

Every transaction processed at Helpers Near Me goes through recognised payment gateways like Paytm, PayU & others.

Your details are entirely secured & protected against any unauthorised transactions.

11) Customer-friendly 100% Refund Policy

Helpers Near Me follows an excellent, Customer-friendly 100% Refund Policy.

Every transaction you go through here comes with an assurance of helping you find & hire a Driver or any other worker you might want to search on the platform.

For every genuine reason, the refunds at Helpers Near Me are processed without any questions asked.

Learn more about the 100% Refund Policy at Helpers Near Me.

Imagine what this convenience brings you when searching for a Driver on call.

This comfort solves all the trouble you had to take otherwise to find a Driver.

So, next time you need to hire a Driver, try Helpers Near Me.

Helpers Near Me is the easiest way to find a Driver on call.

Along with Drivers, Helpers Near Me has many other workers registered on its platform who work at Homes, Offices & Small Businesses, like Cooks, Drivers, Babysitters, Security Guards, Beauticians for your Parlour business, Helpers for Elders, Car Washers and many others.

Quick Links:

To find & hire workers near you, try Helpers Near Me.

Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

Refer to some of our Customer Reviews. Find what they have to say about Helpers Near Me.

Legally Verify the credentials of your Maid, Driver, Security Guards, Babysitters, Cooks, Gardener or any other workers. Try the Professional Verification Services of Helpers Near Me.

Want to get quick answers to some of your questions? Read our FAQs section.

We recommend hiring workers from Helpers Near Me. Here’s why:

Helpers Near Me uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.

Find how many Workers have joined the movement to connect with YOU directly.

Many of the workers have also received local employment opportunities.
